frontend.name: NextJS
frontend.description: A React framework for building server-side rendered and statically generated web applications.

frontend.name: TailwindCSS
frontend.description: A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

frontend.name: Jotai
frontend.description: Jotai is a primitive, flexible, and extensible state management library for React. It's easy to use and has a tiny footprint (~1kb minified and gzipped).

frontend.name: TypeScript
frontend.description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.

frontend.name: Tanstack Query
frontend.description: TanStack Query is a powerful and versatile data fetching and caching library for React and React Native.

frontend.name: NextUI
frontend.description: NextUI is a collection of essential React components built on top of Tailwind CSS.

backend.name: NodeJS
backend.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

backend.name: Directus
backend.description: Directus is a headless CMS that provides an API-first content management system for your website or application.

backend.name: NestJS
backend.description: Nest is a progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable, and scalable server-side applications.

backend.name: ExpressJS
backend.description: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.

backend.name: Fastify
backend.description: Fastify is a web framework that provides a simple and efficient way to build server applications.

backend.name: Prisma
backend.description: Prisma is a database toolkit that provides a high-level API for building, managing, and querying databases in Node.js and TypeScript.
